title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Senator Marsha Blackburn talks to C&B about masks in schools, why Dems love lockdowns, the border, the budget. Caller on failing schools. Dr. Marty Makary: Stop talking about vaccinated vs. unvaccinated, speak in terms of immune vs. not immune. CNN fires 3 employees for refusing vaccination. Jennifer Aniston says she's cutting the unvaccinated out of her life. Caller wonders whether covid increases correlate with where the Biden administration is sending illegal immigrants. The legality of employer vaccine mandates.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
